Detailed Description

Author:
Mark Hoemmen
Date:
Time-stamp: <2008-07-16 10:59:13 mhoemmen>
Preliminary, uncompleted new Harwell-Boeing file parser in C.

Function Documentation

hb_token_t hb_token_start ( const char *  s,
const size_t  lenmax,
int *  error 
)

Start tokenizing a given string: convert the string into a token stream.

Parameters:
s [IN]: The string to turn into a token stream. Modifying this string after calling hb_token_start() puts the token stream in an undefined state.
lenmax [IN]: Upper bound on length of s. If (size_t) -1, then there is no upper bound.
error [OUT]: If no errors, set to FMT_NO_ERROR, else set to the corresponding error value.
Returns:
A token stream.

hb_token_t next_hb_token ( hb_token_t  tok,
int *  error 
)

Advance the input token stream TOK by one token.
